Class AttendeeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • AttendeeController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrganizerController
    public class AttendeeController
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller that deals with Attendee users

                          MessageManager messageManager,

        This constructs an AttendeeController object
        Parameters:
        userManager - the instance of the User Manager
        eventManager - the instance of the Event Manager
        messageManager - the instance of the Message Manager
        username - the username of the Attendee accessing the AttendeeController
